title: Update: #AirbnbWhileBlack
description: A few months ago, Hidden Brain investigated claims that Airbnb users were facing discrimination on the platform. Now, we bring you an update on the company's response.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
content:encoded: A few months ago, Hidden Brain investigated claims that Airbnb users were facing discrimination on the platform. Now, we bring you an update on the company's response.
